testcase.name: Search Customer By EmailID
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User open URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed When When User enter Email "admin@yourstore.com" and Password "admin".......passed When Click on Login.........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed Then Finish.................................................................passed And Enter customer Email....................................................passed When Click on search button.................................................passed Then User should found Email in the Search table............................passed Then close browser..........................................................passed
